name: A dungeon without a dragon
description:
• A turn-based game whose goal is simply to kill all opponents
Camera Control:
  • W or ↑ - Camera up
  • A or ← – Camera to the left
  • S or ↓ – Camera down
  • D or → – Camera to the right

Character:
  • To control the character, click on the hero and you'll see where you can go
Finish the move:
  • The "T" button
  • The button in the middle of the screen at the bottom "End Turn"
Attack:
  1. Click on the character
  2. The enemy will be outlined
  3. Click on the enemy
  4. Finish the move
HP Potion:
  1. Click on the character
  2. Click on the potion
